# Bluedot Tools for Django REST framework

# Requirements

- Python (3.5, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8, 3.9)
- Django (2.2, 3.0, 3.1)

# Installation

Install using `pip`...

```
    pip install bluedot_rest_framework
```

Add `'bluedot_rest_framework'` to your `INSTALLED_APPS` setting.

```
    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ...
        'bluedot_rest_framework',
    ]
```
